entry.title: Myrsol Lemon Hair Wash 235ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Shampoos & Conditioners
Price: 25.00

Myrsol Lemon Hair Wash Lotion 235ml. Exquisite lemon lotion formulated and developed by Myrsol Laoratories. Its formulation makes it ideal to wash the hair at anytime and anyplace without the need of water. Effective against dandruff, hyper secretion of sebaceous glands (seborrhea), granite, and itching.

Directions of use; preferable get the hair wet even if it can be done on dry hair, massage the scalp with fingertips during one to two minutes. It will clean dirt, grease and dandruff that may have appeared on the hair. Lastly, rub with a towel leaving hair clean, soft, shiny, and plenty of vitality.

Dermatologically tested.

Made in Spain.

entry.title: Myrsol Coconut and Mint Shaving Cream 150ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Colognes
Price: 21.50

Myrsol Coconut and Mint Shaving Cream 150ml. Myrsol is a cosmetic laboratory, which manufactures shaving products and hair treatment products.

Shaving cream enriched with lanolin, specially created for brushing. Softens facial hair improving blade glide. Its creamy morbid texture facilitates the formation of a thick and dense lather that makes shaving a pleasure. It respects the PH of the skin, protects and hydrates.

Its fragrance provides the final touch to achieve a perfect shaving experience. Fresh and tropical fragrance based on coconut and mint. In addition, it hydrates and tones the skin during shaving.

Made in Spain.


Ingredients: Water, Stearic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Cocos Nucifera, Sodium Hydroxide, Lanolin, Glycerine, Menthol, Parfum

entry.title: Myrsol 1972 Eau de Cologne Don Carlos 235ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Colognes
Price: 30.00

Don Carlos Aldecoa Ricou grandson of Don Miguel Ricou Sulé is the one who devised this Eau de Cologne with this fragrance with an exquisite and elegant perfume .

Contains : Menthol and citric acid extractsthat will bring us freshness

Provides : Freshness, tonicity and vitality and its fragrance lasts for hours

 

Dermatologically Analyzed and Tested.

Container rustic glass and elegant 235 ml.

Made in Spain by MYRSOL Laboratories

entry.title: Myrsol 1972 Don Carlos Shaving Cream 150gr
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Colognes
Price: 22.50

Myrsol Don Carlos Shaving Cream 1972 150gr. Shaving cream enriched with lanoline. Especially created for shaving with a brush. The cream softens the hair making it easier for the blade to slide across the face. The soft, creamy texture makes it easy to create a rich, dense lather that turns your shaving ritual into a pleasant shaving experience. It respects the PH of the skin, protects and hydrates.

Fragrance: floral, sweet, citric, spiced and fresh.

Ingredients: Water, Stearic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Cocos Nucifera, Sodium Hydroxide, Lanolin, Glycerine, Parfum

entry.title: Myrsol Blue Shaving Cream 150ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Colognes
Price: 22.50

Myrsol Blue Shaving Cream 150ml. Shaving soap enriched with lanolin. It has been especially formulated for use with a brush. It softens the facial hair making it easier for the blade to slide over the skin smoothly. Its soft creamy texture makes for a thick, dense foam that makes shaving enjoyable. It respects the skin’s PH balance and both protects and hydrates.

Blue aroma: Intimate and refreshing aroma that reminds us of clean white cotton. This is accompanied by subtle sweet touches.


Ingredients: Aqua, Stearic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Cocos, Nucifera, Sodium Hydroxide, Lanolin, Glycerin, Parfum

entry.title: Myrsol Blue Eau de Cologne 235ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Colognes
Price: 30.00

Myrsol Blue Eau de Cologne 235ml successfully brings back the brand’s classic aromas. This aroma has been reinvented and is now longer-lasting. A fresh and timeless cologne.

“Blue” is inspired in fresh and intimate aromas that remind us of clean white cotton. This is accompanied by subtle sweet touches.

Made in Spain.

entry.title: Myrsol White Hair Tonic 235ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Hair Tonic
Price: 15.00

It is an extraordinary, revitalizing formula especially for the care of white and gray hair. Helps hair turn yellow. the formation of dandruff or fat and helps to preserve the hair. It has a pleasant and fine aroma. It is recommended to apply on clean hair and extend. Do not clarify.

entry.title: Myrsol Blue Aftershave (180ml/6.1oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Aftershaves
Price: 25.00

This Blue aftershave from Myrsol's signature catalogue stands apart from the rest for its refreshing feeling and scent.

The aftershave carries touches of menthol to create an authentic scent and an overall exceptional product for skin by revitalising and tightening. It also works as a pre-shave balm, giving customers every excuse to use it more than once. 

While the aftershave itself is fantastic, the glass bottle that holds it is noticeably reflective of its traditional quality. Inspired by the classic apothecary style, this bottle is an excellent commodity for shoppers of your business. 

(180ml / 6oz) 

Myrsol products are a proud product of Valencia, Spain.

entry.title: Myrsol F./Extra Aftershave (180ml/6.1oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Aftershaves
Price: 25.00

Myrsol's classic F./Extra aftershave is a customer favourite that bears sophistication and quality so rarely found in shaving products today. 

The vintage appeal carried in its glass bottle has an incredibly simple look and a bottle that has fantastic grip. Its scent is made to last and is an essential for customers that yearn for high quality. 

Each aftershave also works as a pre-shave balm, is alcohol based, and contains properties for that tighten skin. The menthol scented aftershave is a must have for gentlemen who love to look as great as they feel. 

(180ml / 6oz)

A unique and beautiful product from Barcelona, Spain.

entry.title: Myrsol Emulsion Pre / Aftershave (180ml/6.1oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Shave Oil
Price: 25.00

 

Myrsol products are celebrated worldwide for the quality products they've manufactured since the 1940s.

The Emulsion edition of their famous products works great when applied before and after every shave. It's also an excellent alternative for shavers seeking a thicker and lustrous application over its liquid counterparts.

In it's simple and beautiful glass container, Myrsol Emulsifier makes an excellent investment or gift for all kinds of shaving gentlemen. 

(180ml / 6oz)

A remarkable product imported from Valencia, Spain.

entry.title: Myrsol Antesol Pre/Postshave Massage (180ml/6.1oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Shave Oil
Price: 25.00

Myrsol's Antesol works as a pre-shave and a post-shave tonic. This product refresh when its splashes into the pores, creating an enhanced wet-shaving experience. 

As with all Myrsol products, this mixture is crafted specifically with exquisite attention to detail. Because it's designed to soften skin and disinfect it with every use, this product contains only the most necessary ingredients for an aftershave.  

The refreshing mixture meets the needs of the shaving gentleman. Since it carries vintage appeal, this product possesses the power to attract the older gentleman, while the unique and classic look captures the attention of the young man, making this appealing to all of the gentlemen shopping at your store.  

(180ml / 6oz) 

This incredible product is from Valencia, Spain.

entry.title: Myrsol 'Metilsol' Astringent After Shave (180ml/6.1oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Aftershaves
Price: 25.00

The Metilsol aftershave is a signature Myrsol product that simultaneously as a pre-shaving application as well. 

In its' subtle mint base, the Metilsol has a light herbal scent, with properties to replenish, revitalise, and refresh skin with every use. 

The Myrsol Metilsol is perfect for sensitive skin. It tightens skin for greater results and is a natural disinfectant.   

Believe it or not, Myrsol didn't perfect their products overnight. The aftershave brand has been impressing its users since the 1940s. Though quality has improved over the years, little has changed this signature line's ability deliver, making this product a true testament to the quality of a bygone era. 

(180ml / 6oz) 

This incredible product is from Valencia, Spain.

entry.title: Myrsol Lemon Aftershave (180ml/6.1oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Aftershaves
Price: 25.00

 

Myrsol offers a colourful variety of exceptional aftershaves. The intoxicating Lemon edition is a delightful tribute to vintage wet-shaving, barbershops, and apothecaries. 

All Myrsol aftershaves work as pre-shave balms as well, meaning that the alcohol based mixture works as a skin tightening and restructuring agent. 

Because the Lemon aftershave contains a delightful lemon extract, it can't help but be reminiscent of classic shaving products, putting this aftershave in a league of its own.   

(180ml / 6oz)

Another exceptional wet shaving product, manufactured in Valencia, Spain.

Myrsol's Formula C aftershave is a refreshing aftershave tonic that also functions as a pre-shave balm. Since this product smells wonderful, your customers will find any excuse to put this aftershave on more than once. 

The Formula C edition from Myrsol's signature line is an alcohol-based concoction that tightens skin made with Lila’s aroma and subtle hints of mint for a refreshing kick. 

This excellent tonic both smells and feels fresh, also carried in an exceptional glass bottle built for incredible grip and vintage appeal. 

(180ml / 6oz)

A product perfected in Barcelona, Spain.

entry.title: Myrsol Liquid Shaving Cream (200ml/6.8oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Shave Creams
Price: 15.00

 

Myrsol is an industry leader in aftershave production, though the renowned Spanish manufacturer's catalogue carries this incredible Liquid Shaving Cream.

This wet-shaving cream contains lanolin, glycerin, and coconut oil, a combination of ingredients essential for leaving skin healthy and refreshed. 

Gentlemen seek simplicity and effectiveness in the products that they use, meaning this exceptional product exceeds expectations in looks, style and performance. In its vintage style bottle, this makes an excellent gift that will charm anyone lucky enough to use it.  

(180ml / 6oz)

An excellent product manufactured, bottled, and imported from Valencia, Spain.

entry.title: Myrsol Plastic Shave After Shave Massage (180ml/6.0oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Aftershaves

The Plastic edition of Myrsol aftershaves is just one incredible product from the Spanish manufacture's signature line of alcohol-based products that are designed to tighten and strengthen skin.

Since these aftershaves contain clean ingredients, this product works to clean skin, as a pre-shave balm as well., meaning that using these products is a refreshing delight for adding the final finishing touches.  

Myrsol's aftershaves are as exceptional as the bottle that holds them. This glass container provides a secure grip, with a vintage typography label that reflects the attention and care that Myrsol put into every product, guaranteed to be noticed by young and mature shavers alike.

entry.title: Myrsol After Shave Balsamic Water (180ml/6.1oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Aftershaves
Price: 25.00

 

The Balsamic Water aftershave by Myrsol contains hints of lavender, thyme, and rosemary. Needless to say, the Spanish manufacturer has a traditional approach to making their world-class aftershaves. 

This aftershave also works when applied to a pre-shave, an excellent product for regenerating skin and tightening while soothing and refreshing. 

Since the 1940s, Myrsol has been creating incredible products that serve the test of time. The vintage bottle and label don't imitate a past era; the product itself is a staple of it, meaning that their products are ones you and your customers can trust. 

(180ml / 6oz) 

This product is from Valencia, Spain.

entry.title: Myrsol 'Don Miguel 1919' After Shave Lotion (180ml/6.08oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Myrsol
Type: Aftershaves
Price: 25.00

Myrsol aftershaves draw inspiration from classic barber supplies. The 'Don Miguel 1919' version from their signature line is simply incredible, and returns for the first time since the 1960s. 

The old style glass bottle yields for better grip and carries an aftershave that emits the beautiful scent of Jasmine, a masculine scent that compliments every shave. 

Since it also repairs skins and is anti-irritation, this aftershave is the perfect way to end each shave, an excellent gift that can be appreciated by every shaving man.

(180ml / 60oz)

An exceptional product manufactured in Barcelona, Spain.
